nodes.text: The Nimat system was located in the Tharin sector, a part of the Slice portion of the Outer Rim Territories. It was situated on the super-hyperroute known as the Triellus Trade Route, which connected it to Junkfort Station and the Tammar system. The Nimat system shared its name with the Nimat Corridor, an Outer Rim region that included the Annoo system of the Tharin sector.
The Nimat system was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square T-8.
